description:
Kurosaki Ryuuichi is a delinquent guy whom http://anidb.net/ch89068 [Yoshiko] interacts with, he becomes Yoshiko`s disciple. He tries to become friends with http://anidb.net/ch89069 [Akuru] but fails because of his shyness, and ends up acting more like his underling.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kurosaki Ryuuichi
